titleStmt.title: A briefe catechisme containing the summe of the Gospell of Iesus Christ, and his life, declared more at large by the foure euangelists, Mathew, Marke, Luke, and Iohn / written by Edmund Littleton, of Sittingborne in Kent, preacher.
titleStmt.author: Littleton, Edmund.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Purslouue, for Simon Stafford,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
